snippet.title: LIMSCAPE DEMO 01 リムスケープ-デモ、トレイラー01
snippet.description:
In LIMSCAPE, you can explore an eerie yet beautiful world that stretches endlessly, while wandering through quiet, empty spaces. There are no monsters, but you might get a few surprises and find yourself lost at times. Enjoy the photorealistic environments powered by Unreal Engine's Lumen technology. Coming in October 2024.

LIMSCAPEでは、誰もいない静かな場所をぼーっと歩きながら、終わりのない不気味で美しい世界を探索できます。モンスターはいないけれど、時にはドキッとする瞬間や迷う場面も。Unreal EngineのLumen技術が生み出すフォトリアルな空間をお楽しみください。2024年10月リリース予定。

------------------------------------------
Download (Windows10/11) Planned for release in mid-October 2024
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3227460/LIMSCAPEDEMO/
------------------------------------------
Official web site
https://limscape.com/
------------------------------------------
Comunity
https://discord.com/invite/TfDB5qHy9f
